In England, in the seven days to 09 April, there were 15,871 new confirmed cases (28.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 April, there were 21,194 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (5,323 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 April is 3,826,495 (6,798.2 cases per 100,000 population).
